I'm actively developing applications using TypeScript and React for frontend development and Express.js for backend development.My strength is my ability to deeply immerse myself in whatever interests me. During my school days, I dedicated myself passionately to learning English, and now I'm fully engaged in programming. languageExchangeApp.title: Language Exchange App
languageExchangeApp.description: This app is designed to help language learners connect with the right language partners. You can search for learners by filtering based on gender, learning language, and age. Once you find a match, you can chat or have video calls to practice and improve your language skills in real time.

foodOrderingApp.title: Food Ordering App
foodOrderingApp.description: This app allows users to order food online seamlessly with real-time order tracking and a user-friendly interface.
